original_title: ルパン三世 ハリマオの財宝を追え！！
overview: The infamous bandit Harimao hid a treasure, and to retrieve it, Lupin and the gang must gather three lost statues. When the Nazi-like group Neo-Himmel make a run for the goods, Lupin reluctantly partners with the aging "double-O" MI-6 agent Sir Archer and his granddaughter Diana to gather the statues first. Can this unorthodox team bond well enough to see this mission through?
tagline: The bandit Harimao's treasure is within reach!
title: Lupin the Third: The Pursuit of Harimao's Treasure
